details.name: description
details.old_value:
1.) There are reddish visual effecs on ST_DIFFUSEMAP stages. Note: CGEN_LIGHTING_DIFFUSE is missing. Clarify if "rgbGen lightingDiffuse" shader param creates an implicit ST_DIFFUSEMAP stage (see xreal tr_shader.c) 
6.3.8 rgbGen lightingDiffuse
Colors are computed using a standard diffuse lighting equation. It uses the vertex normals to illuminate the object correctly.

Design Note: - rgbGen lightingDiffuse is used when you want the RGB values to be
computed for a dynamic model (i.e. non-map object) in the world using
regular in-game lighting. For example, you would specify on shaders for
items, characters, weapons, etc.
2.) There is no reflection See MP40.(spawn as axis on radar and move the weapon) Changing UNIFORM_VIEWORIGIN to viewOrigin might help.
details.new_value:
1.) There are reddish visual effecs on ST_DIFFUSEMAP stages.

Note: CGEN_LIGHTING_DIFFUSE is missing?!

2.) There is no reflection
See MP40.(spawn as axis on radar and move the weapon) 
Changing UNIFORM_VIEWORIGIN to viewOrigin might help.
